ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Prospection'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Connection'), ISCHANGED(Status), CONTAINS(TEXT(Qualificador__c), 'Outbound'), ISBLANK ( Email ) || ISBLANK ( Product_or_service_website_URL__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Para avan√ßar de fase, preencha o Email e o Site da Web.
